result.title: The Resistance(Avalon) game during IOI 2017
result.content:
Hi everyone! I apologize for writing a topic that is not oriented towards everyone, just towards IOI participants, but I really don't know any other place to ask the question.

Are there people interested in playing ([Avalon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Resistance_(game)) in days of our stay in Tehran? I find this game really interesting, and it's a nice way to have fun during the stay in Iran. If there is anyone interested, please comment of DM me.

Best of luck in the incoming IOI :)
